Key Match Events: Bobby Witt Jr. drove in his 100th run of the season with a solo homer in the first inning
The Royals scored twice in the fifth inning
The Pirates scored their lone run in the fifth on an RBI single by Cruz
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Royals won for the seventh time in nine games since a seven-game losing streak
The Royals assured themselves of their first winning season since 2015
The Royals began the day with a 2½-game lead over Minnesota for the second AL wild card
Others: Michael Wacha (13-7) gave up one run in five innings to improve to 9-1 with a 2.68 ERA in 13 starts since the beginning of July
John Schreiber, Sam Long, James McArthur, Kris Bubic and Lucas Erceg combined for four innings of five-hit ball for Kansas City
Kansas City’s Michael Massey doubled and scored on third baseman Jared Triolo’s error in the fifth
Bryan Reynolds and Triolo each had two hits for the Pirates
